shoutout: Thanks to Barrett, Laura and Ally for making the Fruit Stand project fun and for being awesome teammates.

shoutout: Thanks, Elisa, for the thoughtful insights that so perfectly articulate a lot of my same feelings that I have a hard time explaining. And for the laughs!! Love your speeches. Cat people unite!

shoutout: Jackie, thank you for helping me through the first day and your all-around positive energy!

shoutout: Thanks Jeff for always making me laugh everyday!

name: Julie Mike
shoutout: Julie, it's awesome how you're willing to keep plugging away at this. You put a ton of effort into it and it really shows.

shoutout: Kelly, getting to know you has been really refreshing.

shoutout: Laura, it's fun having someone else who truly appreciates the awesomeness of science-fiction. Thanks for sharing your geekiness!
